Brenda

messages.subject: Movie making?
messages.msgSnippet: Didn t someone here want links for exploring different movie making techniques with their kids?  I came across this one today, which involves the use of Lego
messages.messageBody:
Didn't someone here want links for exploring different movie making
techniques with their kids? I came across this one today, which involves
the use of Lego bricks and imovie for the Macintosh to create 2001; a Lego
Odyssey.

http://eksl.cs.umass.edu/%7Eatkin/movies/

Jocelyn
